game.name: Xtrem Demolition Derby Racing
game.description:
The best finisher in the world will be rewarded for sure! Do your insane driving abilities allow you to play this role perfectly? If yes, join Xtreme Demolition Derby Racing and be prepared to push the acceleration to the optimum level and clear all other vehicles that you see in your arena. Yes, your primary objective in this brand new racing game is to crash all the cars that you see on the map. The controls are pretty simple and easy to handle.

Fasten your seat belt and get ready to destroy all vehicles from map to win the present mission in this one of the best car games for boys! This another demolition car crash challenge features everything that you need to keep you engrossed for hours. You can hit the other vehicles until all their health are finished. The health bar of your opponents will be shown in the red colour, while your health status will be shown through the green bar.

See the screen to know how many cars you have to destroy in the current mission! No need to be relaxed for a single moment as your opponents will keep attacking you regularly. Try to hit the other vehicle from the front angle to destroy it immediately in this cool car demolition game! Our website is also full of other free car games that you can play on all the latest browsers and devices without download. So, what are you waiting for? Stay with us to find the long hours in just a few clicks on your mouse or by tapping the screen!
